    • Constructor Detail

      • Man

        Man(int vX,
    int vY,
    boolean vIsFromWhiteTeam)
        Builds a man piece.
        Parameters:
        vX - X position of this man piece.
        vY - Y position of this man piece.
        vIsFromWhiteTeam - Boolean representing the team of the man piece (true if white, false otherwise).
